    • \
    • global
    • \ZendGuardEncodeTask

    Encodes files using Zeng Guard Encoder

    This is very closely based on the ANT class of the same name.

    author Petr Rybak
    version $Id: cdbb2883ab70c650896a465a872b3da30f13eb00 $
    package phing.tasks.ext.zendguard
    since 2.4.3
    copyright 2001,2002 THYRELL. All rights reserved

    This is abstract here, but may not be overloaded by subclasses.

    Provides a project level log event to the task.

    log(string $msg, integer $level) 
    Inherited
    see \global\BuildEvent
    see \global\BuildListener
    inherited_from \Task::log()
    inherited_from \MatchingTask::log()

    Parameters

    $msg

    string

    The message to log

    $level

    integer

    The priority of the message

    Do the work

    main() 

    This method may be called more than once, if the task is invoked more than once. For example, if target1 and target2 both depend on target3, then running phing target1 target2 will run all tasks in target3 twice.

    Should throw a BuildException if someting goes wrong with the build

    This is abstract here. Must be overloaded by real tasks.

    Exceptions

    \BuildException

    Configure this task if it hasn't been done already.

    inherited_from \MatchingTask::setCaseSensitive()

    $isCaseSensitive

    boolean

    "true"|"on"|"yes" if file system is case sensitive, "false"|"off"|"no" when not.

    Sets whether default exclusions should be used or not.

    prepareEncoderCommand() 

    Verifies that the configuration is correct

    verifyConfiguration() 

    Exceptions

    \BuildException

     Properties

     

    $aspTags : bool

    (default: off). On or off must be specified as an argument when using this option. The default, when this option is not used in the command-line, is - off

     

    $deleteSource : bool

    This option has no option parameter. When this option is use, do not use the output_file parameter.

    Warning: To avoid permanent loss of non-encoded scripts, make a backup. Deleted files cannot be restored or recovered and will be permanently deleted with this option. If you are unsure about deleting the source files, use the ––rename-source option instead

     

    $description : string
    Inherited
    inherited_from \Task::$$description
    inherited_from \MatchingTask::$$description
     

    $encodeCommand 
     

    $encodedOnly : bool

    This option generates files that work exclusively with associated encoded files. Associated encoded files are those generated by the same company. Files that do not share the same encoded company association cannot call these files

     

    $expires : string

    Date is in yyyy-mm-dd format.

     

    $fileset : \FileSet
    Inherited
    inherited_from \MatchingTask::$$fileset
     

    $filesets 
     

    $forceEncode : bool

    (NOT recommended!)

     

    $ignoreFileModes : bool
     

    $licenseProduct : bool

    If enabled, productName must be defined.

     

    $location : \Location
    Inherited
    inherited_from \Task::$$location
    inherited_from \MatchingTask::$$location
     

    $noHeader : bool

    Encoded files generated with this option will not display a meaningful error when loaded by PHP that doesn't have the Zend Optimizer properly installed. Using this option saves approximately 1.5KB for every encoded file. Do not use it unless disk space constraints are critica

     

    $obfuscationLevel : int

    Defaults to 0 (no obfuscation).

     

    $optMask : int

    (default value: [+++++++]) opt_mask is an integer representing a bit-mask. The default value enables all of the optimization passes. Each optimization pass of the Zend Optimizer can be turned on or off based on the mask entered

     

    $privateKeyPath : string
     

    $productName : string

    Must be defined if licenseProduct or signProduct is set to 1

     

    $project : \Project
    Inherited
    inherited_from \ProjectComponent::$$project
    inherited_from \Task::$$project
    inherited_from \MatchingTask::$$project
     

    $prologFile : string
     

    $renameSourceExt : string

    If specified deleteSource will be automatically disabled.

     

    $shortTags : bool

    On or off must be specified as an argument when using this option. The default, when option is not used in the command-line, is - on

     

    $signProduct : bool
